Name: Riddle and Reunion
Description:
Riddle Twiddle is offering a limited special prize! Join Yangyang and try to win it!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
Riddle Twiddle is offering a limited special prize! Join Yangyang and try to win it!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The lantern riddles look fun. Would you like to give them a try?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, {PlayerName}? Are you up for the challenge?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look, I've got some tough riddles fresh from the press. Solve three and you'll win the jackpot. It's a collector's item, trust me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tough riddles...

Options.PlotLineKey: I might need some backup on this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Together? Is that allowed in the rules?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then, if that's allowed in the rules... I'd like to take on this challenge together with {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, it's a festival after all. What could be more important than having fun? Yangyang, you seemed totally into our riddles. I bet you'd enjoy solving them yourself!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, my riddles are tough! Wouldn't want to have {PlayerName} make a fool out of themselves, now would I?

Options.PlotLineKey: I won't be so sure about that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right! How about we get you warmed up with an appetizer? Riddle Number 1: Round as the moon, with a belly just as white. In the air it may leap, in the waters it may creep.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Name this Tacet Discord!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's round in shape with a white belly, able to swim in water... Could it be...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not quite. Try again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not quite. Try again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not quite. Try again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right. You got it. It's a Gulpuff!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Gulpuff really does remind you of the moon when it jumps up in the air, doesn't it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember when I was little... I loved the Moon-Chasing Festival. We'd make Plumpcakes in all sorts of shapes, mostly cute round animals...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We all loved the Gulpuff Plumpcakes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, truly a kids' favorite. Now... On to the next riddle! This one might be a bit trickier!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're given a cage full of chickens and rabbits. You count 14 heads and 38 legs...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Question... How many chickens and rabbits are there in total? Your five-minute timer starts… Now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah... Isn't that more like a math problem than a riddle...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem... You see, it's a question with a definitive answer. And since it's hanging under a lantern, let's call it a riddle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...If you say so. Still, it feels a bit off...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember learning how to solve it in class, such as the "half-leg method"...

Options.PlotLineKey: You got this one in the bag. Right, Yangyang?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, I'll see what I can do...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Done! The answer is... 5 rabbits and 9 chickens!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (First, suppose that all of them are chickens, then calculate the difference in the number of legs, getting the amount of rabbits... I see.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are 5 rabbits and 9 chickens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct! You figured it out even faster than Mr. Bosong. I'm impressed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For the last riddle, how about we change things up a bit? You two can pick one from any of the lanterns.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Xieyang gestures to a row of lanterns above, adorned with swaying riddle slips.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Umm... I don't really see any riddles...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, the riddles here are written in special ink. You'll have to hold them close to a lantern in order to see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course. The more suspense, the better! Solving lantern riddles is like a journey of discovery. You'll have to trust your instincts!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see... That does make things more interesting.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll leave it to you, Yangyang.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Me? Well... Then I'll choose, this one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alrighty! Let's see... The riddle has revealed itself！

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am made up of many, but can also be one. I bring people together and make them have fun. What am I?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Name this phrase!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Made up of many, but can also be one...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ooh. Close, but not close enough!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I know. It's "Family", right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bravo. You've completed all 3 riddles. The special prize is yours!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xieyang brings out a beautifully crafted lantern adorned with drawings of "The Fox and the Moon" tale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's so pretty...!

Options.PlotLineKey: Yangyang, you seem to like it a lot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it's not just any lantern.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was little when I last received a lantern like this... I really miss those times.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were lucky to get this lantern from a renowned collector for our special occasion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's said that Sentinel "Hsin" handcrafted it and hid many more in the woodlands, making it a prized possession. Finding one is like getting a year's worth of blessings.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How's that for a souvenir? Congratulations! Endless fortune be with you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, do you have a moment?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can we... go on a walk together?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember always looking forward to the Moon-Chasing Festival when I was a child.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fireworks light up the night sky, lanterns dot every street corner, and we indulge in family-made plumpcakes. Every face I see is filled with joy...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Those memories have grown fuzzy, but I still remember the heartfelt smiles of my loved ones.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I joined the Midnight Rangers to protect their happy smiles... Even if my strength alone won't make much difference, I'll do what I can.

Options.PlotLineKey: See, everyone's having a great time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! This is why I love Jinzhou. I love what we've fought to protect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe a little... But I'm okay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While I can't be with my family today, the laughter in the air is already making me feel delighted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I look at the bright moon, I know they are having a great time somewhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I feel so happy for this moment, and for all you've done.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This year's Moon-Chasing Festival... You've made it feel very special to me.

Options.PlotLineKey: There's still plenty of the Moonlit Fair to enjoy.
I'm sure future festivals will only get better.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed! Any other places you'd like to visit, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's take a little break here before moving on to more spots.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}. I hope... we can always celebrate together, for every festival, just like we do now.
